CustomField.formula: 'Q'+TEXT(CEILING( MONTH ( Case__r.Case_Type_Reported_Date__c )/3 )) + RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(Case__r.Case_Type_Reported_Date__c )), 2) + IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(How_was_MAiD_administered__c , "1 - IV"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death not foreseeable") ,ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death foreseeable")) ) ,"S1", IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(How_was_MAiD_administered__c , "2 - Oral"),ISPICKVAL(How_was_MAiD_administered__c , "3 - Oral and IV")),OR( ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death not foreseeable") ,ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "MAiD death foreseeable"))),"S2", IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Transfer of Request"),"S3", IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Discontinuation of Planning: Withdrawn Request"),"S5", IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Discontinuation of Planning: Ineligible"),"S6", IF(ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, "Discontinuation of Planning: Death Prior"),"S7",""))))))+ '-' + Case__r.PHN__c
CustomField.label: Record_ID1
